import React, { useState } from 'react' import { CContainer, CForm, CFormInput, CFormLabel, CFormText, CFormCheck, CButton } from '@coreui/react' import axios from 'axios' function AdminLogin() { const [loginCred, setLoginCred] = useState({}) sessionStorage.setItem('to','en') const setCred = (e,field) => { setLoginCred({...loginCred, [field] : e.target.value}) } const setTheLang = (e) => { setLoginCred({...loginCred, lang : e.target.value}) sessionStorage.setItem('to',e.target.value) } const [headText, setHeadText] = useState("ADMIN LOGIN"); const Login = (e) => { e.preventDefault() sessionStorage.setItem('from','en') if(loginCred.email != 'admin@gmail.com' || loginCred.password != '12345678'){ alert('Invalid credentials') return }else{ window.location.href='/admin/reported' } } return ( <>
{headText}
Email address setCred(e,'email')} type="email" id="exampleInputEmail1" aria-describedby="emailHelp" />
Email Password setCred(e,'password')} type="password" id="exampleInputPassword1" />
Login ) } export default AdminLogin
